response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the fridge, which was the first subtask. There was no execution error. The next step is to take out the garlic clove from the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the garlic clove
(3) Cook the garlic clove
(4) Take out the butter
(5) Place the cooked garlic clove and butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Take out the garlic clove
